website_summaries.verdict: This natural soap is a good choice for consumers who prefer to use products that don't contain synthetic or harsh ingredients.
pros: Hydrating soap with a clean, invigorating scent
cons: Large bar is tough to hold onto for some

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product not the same as picture shown
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed shea butter is definitely not the first ingredient it’s the sixth do not buy this item it is not what is shown in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY unless you are willing to buy a totally different soap.
customer_reviews.text: Received this soap and it is NOT the same as being shown. The ingredients have changed now to include sodium palmate and sodium cocoate as the first ingredients. In fact HARDLY ANY of the ingredients are what are advertised for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shea butter is not the first ingredient.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the ingredients in bars of soap I ordered are not what is shown on the bar pictured. Have always purchased this soap at the drugstore. Will not purchase these products again.
customer_reviews.author: adelaide gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap... Target discontinued carrying this item. :-(
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS IT! SHEA MOISTURE RAW BUTTER SOAP - FRANKINCENSE AND MYRRH (f/dry skin) I became familiar with this soap through Target, then realized they no longer carry this brand and "Shea Moisture" was out stock for this fragrance. I was distraught because initially I kept seeing what appeared to be my soap on Amazon, however there was a slight difference, being it was not the formula for "dry skin" even though everything else was the same. Well if I've learned anything when buying from the internet, read the ingredients/formula because the slightest variation can make all the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best soap, I cant go without it. My kids have eczema and this helps them alot. I love the smell. I recommend this soap to everyone in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Boombot

customer_reviews.title: ok for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for new soaps since my skin has been reacting to the soaps I have used previously. I have dry, sensitive skin so this is a challenge. I also do not use soaps that are tallow-based. This soap has been working out very well for me so far. The bar is large and it lathers well. The scent is GLORIOUS!! I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Super Sudsy Bar Soap
customer_reviews.text: Best corporate brand for bar soap. All of their bar soaps smell really nice, and they have as many suds as a body wash would. (even though suds are not a sign of antimicrobial properties) Since the ingredients in the product are better than most generic bar soaps, it doesn't last as long, because a lot of product gets on the wash cloth with ease. With two people using it it lasts us about 3-4 weeks per bar. It cleans without making the skin feel dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard bar - good
customer_reviews.text: I'm rebelling against soft "whipped" soap bars that melt into a puddle after a few uses. This one doesn't. It's firm and stays strong use after use. Good.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: No words needed !! It lathers really good and smells amazing I even use on my toddler I always get eczema patches and this has helped
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fraser

customer_reviews.title: True love!
customer_reviews.text: Falling in love with a bar of soap, for heaven’s sake, is not something I ever expected to happen in my lifetime. But here we are, and it’s even love at first touch. The initial, delightful surprise was that even the smallest amount went a long way in the suds department. Okay, nice, but then my cynical self dreaded how hard this surely would be to rinse off. Nope – rinsed like a dream. Left skin feeling great all day – fresh, clean, and not at all dried out – and the aroma (of both the soap and me) was mmm mmm good. Bought it because of the ingredients and the story; love it for that and so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu the Lefty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought, received and used this bar of soap today. It made me so happy as I used something while living in the middle east and it brought back many memories. I cannot rate sensitive skin yet, which I have but will do do soon. A little hard to rate moisturizing too but it feels good so far. I use shea in my face moisturizer. Am a big fan so I am hoping this will be very much the same!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Calming Scent
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is beautiful. It has an earthy refreshing smell. It doesn't seem to dry the skin out. The entire bar had the scent all the way through. It actually reminds me of how men's cologne smells. Nice size bar that lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Chi J

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and good
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of the ingredients Ok to good. We are super picky about what we put onto one of our biggest organs. The fragrance is soft and so nice. My kids love it. I chopped it up to make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: EWinNYC

customer_reviews.title: Clears body pimples!
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't moisturizing it's the opposite, and it smells decent. That's not the reason I got this though. For some reason if you use this stuff for a couple months it's really effective at getting rid of body acne/pimples. It dries everything out and creates an environment that isn't ideal for acne.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra V

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant, Unique Scented Soap that Lasts Awhile
customer_reviews.text: The best attribute of this bar soap is the unique, pleasant scent. While the fragrance of Frankincense and Myrrh takes me back to my travels throughout the Middle East, it's not overbearing nor underwhelming. The soap is marketed for "dry skin" and while I don't find it especially moisturizing, it doesn't dry my skin like other bars I've tried. The soap lasts 6-8 weeks for me which provides excellent value. It's also a bonus that this is a family-owned company which does a good using quality, safe ingredients. I will continue to use this product and definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W

customer_reviews.title: GREAT detoxing and deep cleansing soap!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 and a half months so far. This soap is great. After using it my skin feels as smooth and clean as when I use exfoliating gloves. It doesn't have a scent which I like, and it is a good facial cleanser as well. I have really sensitive skin and it is good for me but sometimes it does dry out my skin if I use my exfoliating gloves with it. Other than that, I am loving this soap!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Smells clean and it's a huge bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he is very pickey about everything he uses. He likes this bar soap so it must be good. Smells clean the color is kinda the same as new born baby crap but I guess that part of the natural ingredients. Lol
customer_reviews.author: shemmy shem

customer_reviews.title: WHAT IS IT?
customer_reviews.text: First off, as soon as I opened the soap the first smell I got and still get is the smell of a fresh bar of soap when you open one at Motel 6!? I assume that these Motels are also using Shea Butter soap cause every single motel and hotel I have ever stayed at has that smell to their soap also!? I have smelled good shea butter before so this was me chalking up a $4 buck loss for a bar of motel soap. I must admit, it's a huge bar lol....
customer_reviews.author: Brad Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great Calming Soap & Excellent for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for Women who are Sensitive and do not want the Ph Balance thrown off yet want to still smell elegant. The scent is strong but pleasant and refreshing. I thought it would effect my ph balance but it did not. It actually is great for women. It leaves a wonder scent that is very calming.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed💖

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your skin
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and the leaves your skin clean and refreshed. People are amazed how my skin looks and feels. Big winner on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kind Dawud

customer_reviews.title: Nice-sized bar of soap with long-lasting fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Halfway through this 8-ounce bar of "Raw shea butter soap w/ frankincense & myrrh extracts" by Shea Moisture, made in USA, and am relatively pleased. Nicely foamy and cleans well. The large size bar is appreciated, and the fragrance is pleasant enough, and is continuing to be noticeable throughout the bar. Reasonably priced. No comment on the presence of shea butter, or whether it's "raw", or other mysterious claims of "moisturizing" or "revitalizing" properties.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: This is possibly the best bar soap I've ever used in my life.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this soap i love it... it doesn't dry out my skin it's so nice to have it smells so good too.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen 46

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Great price, leaves skin soft but like my son says “smells like Grandma” lol
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Beware of Shells
customer_reviews.text: I love this product; however, there were tiny 'things' inside that caused thin scratches on my face. I first thought it might be glass then it occurred to me that it was probably small bits of shell. I haven't purchased more since that experience but I think it was probably an isolated event... or at least hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: SAFIYA D. HOSKINS

customer_reviews.title: Smell of bad perfume
customer_reviews.text: The scent is unnaturally powerful, like a bad perfume. Tossed out the first day. If you are used to the all-natural soap with neutral to mild smell, like those typically sold in Whole Foods, you will hate this one. Only bought this one cuz of the lockdown and the long line in Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It produces a creamy thick lather. Gentle enough for use on all body parts. Full of moisture, doesn't leave a film rinses well. Also good for uneven skin tones per my personal results. It's the only soap I use.
customer_reviews.author: Brena Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: It's very moisturizing even though shea butter isn't listed number one on the list of ingredients. I normally only use body wash, but I received a free bar at the essence festival and now I'm hooked. Not only is my skin very moisturized, but I feel more relaxed than I did with the other soaps......And I normally don't write reviews on anything.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant fragrance....Lathers very good. I have sensitive skin and no reaction to the soap. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carbonelli

customer_reviews.title: Scent is more masculine.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Shea Moisture baby lotion of this scent and was hoping this bar soap was exactly the same, unfortunately this has a completely different smell. I still like it but it’s different than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Men’s Cologne
customer_reviews.text: The smell reminds me of men’s cologne albeit much more subtle but definitely not a soap I’d recommend to women. The scent does seem to fade from skin but takes hours.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this soap, great for my dry sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizing & Aromatic Soap
customer_reviews.text: This is really Great soap with wonderful moisturizing properties, Fantastic aroma & seems to last, however, I don't use it every day. There is also a Great Lotion by same name.

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: it did not smell fragrant and it did not moisturize

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the scent of this soap, I never buy bar soap but my friend gave me a bar to try because she loved it so much, I am now obsessed! Lasts a long time too!

customer_reviews.title: Light scented, large bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: The bar is quite large. The scent is light, smells kind like olive oil. It's a large bar of soap so I cut it in half to make it last longer. I enjoy showering with this soap!

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for a shea butter and this is one is really good. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dry itchy skin. I've used dove, olay and neutrogena doesn't work. It makes my skin even worse. I'm lazy to put lotion most of the time and this just leaves my skin healthy looking!

customer_reviews.title: Best bar of soap!
customer_reviews.text: Best bar of soap! Great value for your money, large bar, makes my skin feel very soft. It has a rich lather. The only bar of soap I use and it comes in other scents!

customer_reviews.title: Great soap

customer_reviews.title: Absoultely love this soap
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this soap. It leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth and this soap smells fantastic! Definitely buying more!

product_meta.title: Raw Shea Butter Bar Soap
product_meta.description: Gently cleanse and moisturize skin with this sulfate-free bar soap. Raw Shea works with Frankincense & Myrrh to hydrate and revitalize skin. Our Story: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was our Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future. Ethically Traded Ingredients Sustainably Produced. Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade Since 1912. Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.
feature_bullets: Gently cleanse and moisturize skin with this sulfate free bar soap; Raw Shea works with Frankincense & Myrrh to hydrate and revitalize skin
Made with Organic Shea Butte Frankincense & Myrrh
Lather in hands or on a washcloth and wash entire body
Made with Fair Trade Shea Butter
No sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no propylene glycol, no mineral oil, no animal testing and no petroleum

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
